title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 932.3 - General Standard for All Persons Subject to Public Officers Law Section 74
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 932.3 - General Standard for All Persons Subject to Public Officers Law Section 74

State Regulations

No individual who is subject to Public Officers Law ยง
74, shall engage in any outside activity which interferes or substantially
conflicts with the proper and effective discharge of such individual's official

State duties or responsibilities. Notes

York State Register July 22, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 29, eff. 7/22/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
